amendatorysection.catchline: Complete record; when made; judge to sign.
amendatorysection.para: The clerk shall make up the complete record required under section 25-1319 in the vacation next after the term at which the same was determined, and the presiding judge of such court shall, at its next term thereafter, subscribe the same.

annotation.para: Fixing of time within which record shall be made is directory. Boettcher v. Lancaster County, 74 Neb. 148, 103 N.W. 1075 (1905).
